info.brief_description: Men put you through classic WWE hell with gross moves
info.description:
You are at the WWE Royal Rumble. You stumble around and end up backstage. There you meet a lot of WWE wrestlers, but they aren’t too happy to see a random person backstage with no reason in being there. They decide to bully and forbid you from leaving.
• Only male wrestlers.
• The male wrestlers can torture you only in a way that has been present on WWE. These would include things like the Kiss My Ass club, the stinkface, the bronco buster, banzai-like drop, and mooning.
• Wrestlers that are dead are allowed (Andre, Test)
• Worship is encouraged.
• No Abrupt ending
• Use correct pronunciation

Suggestions
o Vince McMahon
o Rikishi
o Big Show
o Triple H
o Scott Steiner and Test
o Batista
o Vito: While wearing a dress would often give his opponent a bronco buster.
o Billy Gunn: While known as “Mr. Ass”
o The Rock
o Val Venus
o Andre The Giant
o Stone Cold
o A-Train (not the ring name he goes by now -.-)
